snippet.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Release Date Announcement Trailer (EU - English)
snippet.description:
Join Marona and her Phantom friends on a mission to defeat the sinister Shipwreck Fleet when Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero launches on Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5 on 30 January 2025! 
Steam to follow later in 2025.

In this trailer, learn more about the colorful islands Marona will visit throughout her journey, as well as the new friends - and foes - she will encounter along the way. 

Preorder now @ https://nisamerica.com/phantombrave-the-lost-hero

#PhantomBrave
